Package com.intellij.ui

Class Splash

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • com.intellij.ui.Splash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public final class Splash
extends java.awt.Window
    To customize your IDE splash go to YourIdeNameApplicationInfo.xml and edit 'logo' tag. For more information see documentation for the tag attributes in ApplicationInfo.xsd file.
    See Also:
